Administrator Subclassing / Dual Class Drandum:
If your ability to subclass will be above a certain level, because the subclass you can transfer to the main class.
However, this is a very dangerous experiment, so it will have completed the certification.
If you carry a certificate, I will move some of the power of your subclass to the main class.
However, this operation is very dangerous, it can damage your heart. The soul must necessarily be tempered.
This means that before the operation you need to get Print reincarnation of the Dark Magician .
Want to learn skills that emerged after moving force division in the main class?
